events.message: I recently received my order and noticed the laptop screen has multiple scratches and a dead pixel. This is really disappointing.
The reported issue involves physical damage to the product, categorizing it under product defect for further handling.
Your case has been assigned to our technical support agent who specializes in product issues and defects.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear about the damage to your laptop screen. Let’s see how we can fix this quickly.
Could you please send us clear photos of the scratches and the dead pixel on your laptop screen to assess the damage properly?
I have attached the requested photos of the screen damage. The scratches are visible in the upper left corner, and there is a small dead pixel near the center.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement screen part free of charge or a full device exchange, whichever you prefer.
I appreciate the quick response and will go with a full exchange of the device. Please let me know the next steps.
I am escalating your case to the returns department so they can arrange the exchange process and shipping details.
Your exchange has been processed and the replacement laptop is on its way. You should receive a tracking number shortly.
Just following up to ensure you have received the replacement laptop and that everything is working perfectly now.
We are closing your case now as the replacement process has been completed successfully. Thank you for your patience.
